If you're looking for a mystery that will keep you guessing until the very end, then "Find Me Guilty" might be the perfect movie for you. The film chronicles the true story of a man on trial for a crime he didn't commit.

If you're into something more dark and thought-provoking, then "Donnie Darko" is a must-watch. The film follows a troubled teenager who is haunted by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.

If you're interested in a film about FBI trainees who are being hunted by a serial killer, then "Mindhunters" is a great choice. The film features some of the best actors in the world and is a thrilling and suspenseful thriller.
